name: Alone on Rivers Red
description:
This is a game. Inside a .pdf. So it's all hyperlinks, bby. Please don't scroll, you'll ruin the eXpErIeNcE.

You play as NANO. NANO doesn't have much to do in their shack, in the middle of nowhere, that they can't ever exit. They can go on their computer, stare idly at their weird pendant. Or... Well, we don't talk about that. 

The computer only has internet, no games or anything. Good enough, right?

Well, internet has been out for a while.

Have fun.

If you like the game, think about leaving a comment or looking at our other games! <3 Have great day!

Protip: You can save by writing down the page number you're on!

Credits: Made by fae.exe, alyd asmar and Grizembrrr.

Artworks by the awesome  alyd asmar

---

Made for GGJ 2022 (kind of), with the theme of "duality."
